articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The Israeli military said on Saturday it killed Mohammad Sinwar, Hamas' Gaza chief on May 13, confirming what Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said earlier this week.
articles.title: Israeli military says it killed Hamas military leader Mohammed Sinwar on May 13

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The group said it would release 10 living hostages and 18 bodies.
articles.title: Hamas says Witkoff's Gaza ceasefire proposal must lead to the end of the war

articles.author: Andrew Chung
articles.description: The U.S. Supreme Court swept away this week another obstacle to one of President Donald Trump's most aggressively pursued policies - mass deportation - again showing its willingness to back his hardline approach to immigration. The justices, though, have signaled some reservations with how he is carrying it out.
articles.title: Trump gets key wins at Supreme Court on immigration, despite some misgivings

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Iran previously carried out secret nuclear activities with material not declared to the U.N. nuclear watchdog at three locations that have long been under investigation, the watchdog said in a wide-ranging, confidential report to member states seen by Reuters.
articles.title: IAEA report says Iran had secret activities with undeclared nuclear material

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Five Jewish institutions were sprayed with green paint in Paris overnight and an investigation has been opened, a police source said on Saturday.
articles.title: Several Paris Jewish institutions sprayed with green paint

articles.author: Nidal Al-Mughrabi, James Mackenzie
articles.description: Armed men hijacked dozens of aid trucks entering the Gaza Strip overnight.
articles.title: Gaza aid supplies hit by looting as Hamas ceasefire response awaited

articles.author: Jeff Mason
articles.description: The move ratchets up pressure on global steel producers and furthers Trump's vow to deepen his trade war.
articles.title: Trump says he plans to double steel, aluminum tariffs to 50%

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Two five-year-old girls and a 16-year-old were among the dead, emergency services said.
articles.title: Seven migrant women and children died metres from shore in Canary Islands

articles.author: Rae Wee, Greg Torode
articles.description: China has a "deficit of trust and credibility" it needs to overcome in order to mend its fraught defence ties with the Philippines, though any breakthrough in the near term remains unlikely, Manila's top defence official said on Saturday.
articles.title: Philippines defence chief says China needs to overcome 'deficit of trust'

articles.author: Christian Lowe, Dmitry Antonov
articles.description: Ukraine resisted pressure from Moscow and Washington to commit itself to attending peace talks with Russia on June 2, saying it first needed to see the proposals Russian negotiators plan to bring to the talks.
articles.title: Ukraine keeps Russia guessing over participation in June 2 peace talks
